attributes.action: For big ,dangerous dogs to wear a muzzle in public places.
attributes.additional_details: The fear and physical pain is indescribable. I would like for ALL dogs over a certain size or of a dangerous breed to wear a muzzle in public places.  This law applied to other countries and I think it’s time for the UK to have such law also.
attributes.background: Me and my little dog ( Pekingese ) were attacked by a Staffordshire in a park near our house that we go to everyday.  The dog ran towards my dog and I jumped to save him and now have a scar for life on my face.

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Sir Lindsay Hoyle MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Chorley
